name: flex
description: Goals * An interface for incremental data computation graphs * Cross platform: Clojure and ClojureScript * Work can be scheduled and prioritized * Work can be split across frames (time slicing) * Work can be split across client and server * Work can be split across multiple nodes   * How do we share context? * Graphs can be isolated    * Why?   * Would it share scheduler? Potential to be too greedy if not coordinated together
